_description: Signs of Death — eighteen lines in couplets

Bod416.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 221.

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
Wenne þin heou blokeþand þi strengþe
                    wokeþ…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…þeonne biþ hit sone of þeal so þu neuer
                    ner
OxfJesus29.Note: 12 lines only, set as two six-line stanzas of couplets.
OxfJesus29.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 221.
Morris,  Richard,
                        ed.  
             An Old English Miscellany: A Bestiary, Kentish Sermons, Proverbs of
                Alfred and Religious Poems of the Thirteenth Century.
EETS
         o.s. 49 (1872); repr. 1988: 101.
